013package org.apache.juneau.assertions;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.time.*;
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.function.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
026
027/**
028 * Used for assertion calls against generic POJOs.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * Extends from {@link FluentObjectAssertion} allowing you to perform basic assertions, but adds several transform
032 * methods to convert to more-specific assertion types.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
035 * <p class='bjava'>
036 *    <jk>import static</jk> org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertions.*;
037 *
038 *    List&lt;MyBean&gt; <jv>listOfBeans</jv> = ...;
039 *    <jsm>assertList</jsm>(<jv>listOfBeans</jv>)
040 *       .asItem(1)  <jc>// Returns an AnyAssertion.</jc>
041 *       .asBean()  <jc>// Transforms to BeanAssertion.</jc>
042 *          .asProperty(<js>"foo"</js>)  <jc>// Returns an AnyAssertion.</jc>
043 *          .asString()  <jc>// Transforms to StringAssertion.</jc>
044 *             .is(<js>"bar"</js>);  <jc>// Performs test.</jc>
045 * </p>
046 *
047 * <h5 class='section'>Test Methods:</h5>
048 * <p>
049 * <ul class='javatree'>
050 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
051 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
052 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExists() isExists()}
053 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Object) is(Object)}
054 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Predicate) is(Predicate)}
055 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNot(Object) isNot(Object)}
056 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isAny(Object...) isAny(Object...)}
057 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotAny(Object...) isNotAny(Object...)}
058 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNull() isNull()}
059 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotNull() isNotNull()}
060 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isString(String) isString(String)}
061 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isJson(String) isJson(String)}
062 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSame(Object) isSame(Object)}
063 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameJsonAs(Object) isSameJsonAs(Object)}
064 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSortedJsonAs(Object) isSameSortedJsonAs(Object)}
065 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer) isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer)}
066 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isType(Class) isType(Class)}
067 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExactType(Class) isExactType(Class)}
068 *    </ul>
069 * </ul>
070 *
071 * <h5 class='section'>Transform Methods:</h5>
072 * <p>
073 * <ul class='javatree'>
074 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion}
075 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
076 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asArray(Class) asArray(Class)}
077 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asIntArray() asIntArray()}
078 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asLongArray() asLongArray()}
079 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asShortArray() asShortArray()}
080 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asFloatArray() asFloatArray()}
081 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asDoubleArray() asDoubleArray()}
082 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asCharArray() asCharArray()}
083 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asByteArray() asByteArray()}
084 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asBooleanArray() asBooleanArray()}
085 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asBoolean() asBoolean()}
086 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asBytes() asBytes()}
087 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asCollection() asCollection()}
088 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asCollection(Class) asCollection(Class)}
089 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asStringList() asStringList()}
090 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asComparable() asComparable()}
091 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asDate() asDate()}
092 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asInteger() asInteger()}
093 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asLong() asLong()}
094 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asList() asList()}
095 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asList(Class) asList(Class)}
096 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asMap() asMap()}
097 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asMap(Class,Class) asMap(Class,Class)}
098 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asBean() asBean()}
099 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asBean(Class) asBean(Class)}
100 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asBeanList(Class) asBeanList(Class)}
101 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentAnyAssertion#asZonedDateTime() asZonedDateTime()}
102 *    </ul>
103 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
104 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
105 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString() asString()}
106 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(WriterSerializer) asString(WriterSerializer)}
107 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(Function) asString(Function)}
108 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJson() asJson()}
109 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJsonSorted() asJsonSorted()}
110 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asTransformed(Function) asApplied(Function)}
111 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asAny() asAny()}
112 * </ul>
113 * </ul>
114 *
115 * <h5 class='section'>Configuration Methods:</h5>
116 * <p>
117 * <ul class='javatree'>
118 *    <li class='jc'>{@link Assertion}
119 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
120 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setMsg(String, Object...) setMsg(String, Object...)}
121 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setOut(PrintStream) setOut(PrintStream)}
122 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setSilent() setSilent()}
123 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setStdOut() setStdOut()}
124 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setThrowable(Class) setThrowable(Class)}
125 *    </ul>
126 * </ul>
127 *
128 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
129 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauEcosystemOverview">Overview &gt; juneau-assertions &gt; Overview</a>
130 * </ul>
131 *
132 * @param <T> The object type.
133 * @param <R> The return type.
134 */
135@FluentSetters(returns="FluentAnyAssertion<T,R>")
136public class FluentAnyAssertion<T,R> extends FluentObjectAssertion<T,R> {
137
138   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
139   // Static
140   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
141
142   private static final Messages MESSAGES = Messages.of(FluentAnyAssertion.class, "Messages");
143   private static final String
144      MSG_objectWasNotType = MESSAGES.getString("objectWasNotType");
145
146   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
147   // Instance
148   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
149
150   /**
151    * Constructor.
152    *
153    * @param value
154    *    The object being tested.
155    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
156    * @param returns
157    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
158    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
159    * used on the same assertion.
160    */
161   public FluentAnyAssertion(T value, R returns) {
162      this(null, value, returns);
163   }
164
165   /**
166    * Chained constructor.
167    *
168    * <p>
169    * Used when transforming one assertion into another so that the assertion config can be used by the new assertion.
170    *
171    * @param creator
172    *    The assertion that created this assertion.
173    *    <br>Should be <jk>null</jk> if this is the top-level assertion.
174    * @param value
175    *    The object being tested.
176    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
177    * @param returns
178    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
179    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
180    * used on the same assertion.
181    */
182   public FluentAnyAssertion(Assertion creator, T value, R returns) {
183      super(creator, value, returns);
184   }
185
186   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
187   // Transform methods
188   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
189
190   /**
191    * Converts this object assertion into an array assertion.
192    *
193    * @param <E> The element type of the array.
194    * @param elementType The element type of the array.
195    * @return A new assertion.
196    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an array.
197    */
198   public <E> FluentArrayAssertion<E,R> asArray(Class<E> elementType) throws AssertionError {
199      Utils.assertArgNotNull("elementType", elementType);
200      return new FluentArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(arrayClass(elementType)), returns());
201   }
202
203   /**
204    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive int array assertion.
205    *
206    * @return A new assertion.
207    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an int array.
208    */
209   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Integer,int[],R> asIntArray() throws AssertionError {
210      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(int[].class), returns());
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive long array assertion.
215    *
216    * @return A new assertion.
217    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an long array.
218    */
219   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Long,long[],R> asLongArray() throws AssertionError {
220      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(long[].class), returns());
221   }
222
223   /**
224    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive short array assertion.
225    *
226    * @return A new assertion.
227    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an short array.
228    */
229   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Short,short[],R> asShortArray() throws AssertionError {
230      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(short[].class), returns());
231   }
232
233   /**
234    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive float array assertion.
235    *
236    * @return A new assertion.
237    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an float array.
238    */
239   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Float,float[],R> asFloatArray() throws AssertionError {
240      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(float[].class), returns());
241   }
242
243   /**
244    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive double array assertion.
245    *
246    * @return A new assertion.
247    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an double array.
248    */
249   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Double,double[],R> asDoubleArray() throws AssertionError {
250      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(double[].class), returns());
251   }
252
253   /**
254    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive char array assertion.
255    *
256    * @return A new assertion.
257    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an char array.
258    */
259   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Character,char[],R> asCharArray() throws AssertionError {
260      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(char[].class), returns());
261   }
262
263   /**
264    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive byte array assertion.
265    *
266    * @return A new assertion.
267    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an byte array.
268    */
269   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Byte,byte[],R> asByteArray() throws AssertionError {
270      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(byte[].class), returns());
271   }
272
273   /**
274    * Converts this object assertion into a primitive boolean array assertion.
275    *
276    * @return A new assertion.
277    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an boolean array.
278    */
279   public FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Boolean,boolean[],R> asBooleanArray() throws AssertionError {
280      return new FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(boolean[].class), returns());
281   }
282
283   /**
284    * Converts this object assertion into a boolean assertion.
285    *
286    * @return A new assertion.
287    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a boolean.
288    */
289   public FluentBooleanAssertion<R> asBoolean() {
290      return new FluentBooleanAssertion<>(this, cast(Boolean.class), returns());
291   }
292
293   /**
294    * Converts this object assertion into a byte array assertion.
295    *
296    * @return A new assertion.
297    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a byte array.
298    */
299   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> asBytes() {
300      return new FluentByteArrayAssertion<>(this, cast(byte[].class), returns());
301   }
302
303   /**
304    * Converts this object assertion into a collection assertion.
305    *
306    * @return A new assertion.
307    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a collection.
308    */
309   public FluentCollectionAssertion<Object,R> asCollection() {
310      return asCollection(Object.class);
311   }
312
313   /**
314    * Converts this object assertion into a collection assertion.
315    *
316    * @param <E> The element type of the collection.
317    * @param elementType The element type of the collection.
318    * @return A new assertion.
319    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a collection.
320    */
321   public <E> FluentCollectionAssertion<E,R> asCollection(Class<E> elementType) {
322      Utils.assertArgNotNull("elementType", elementType);
323      return new FluentCollectionAssertion<>(this, cast(Collection.class), returns());
324   }
325
326   /**
327    * Converts this object assertion into a collection assertion.
328    *
329    * @return A new assertion.
330    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a collection.
331    */
332   public FluentStringListAssertion<R> asStringList() {
333      return new FluentStringListAssertion<>(this, cast(List.class), returns());
334   }
335
336   /**
337    * Converts this object assertion into a comparable object assertion.
338    *
339    * @param <T2> The comparable type.
340    * @return A new assertion.
341    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an instance of {@link Comparable}.
342    */
343   public <T2 extends Comparable<T2>> FluentComparableAssertion<T2,R> asComparable() {
344      return new FluentComparableAssertion<>(this, (T2)cast(Comparable.class), returns());
345   }
346
347   /**
348    * Converts this object assertion into a date assertion.
349    *
350    * @return A new assertion.
351    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a date.
352    */
353   public FluentDateAssertion<R> asDate() {
354      return new FluentDateAssertion<>(this, cast(Date.class), returns());
355   }
356
357   /**
358    * Converts this object assertion into an integer assertion.
359    *
360    * @return A new assertion.
361    * @throws AssertionError If object is not an integer.
362    */
363   public FluentIntegerAssertion<R> asInteger() {
364      return new FluentIntegerAssertion<>(this, cast(Integer.class), returns());
365   }
366
367   /**
368    * Converts this object assertion into a long assertion.
369    *
370    * @return A new assertion.
371    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a long.
372    */
373   public FluentLongAssertion<R> asLong() {
374      return new FluentLongAssertion<>(this, cast(Long.class), returns());
375   }
376
377   /**
378    * Converts this object assertion into a list assertion.
379    *
380    * @return A new assertion.
381    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a list.
382    */
383   public FluentListAssertion<Object,R> asList() {
384      return asList(Object.class);
385   }
386
387   /**
388    * Converts this object assertion into a list assertion.
389    *
390    * @param <E> The element type.
391    * @param elementType The element type.
392    * @return A new assertion.
393    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a list.
394    */
395   public <E> FluentListAssertion<E,R> asList(Class<E> elementType) {
396      Utils.assertArgNotNull("elementType", elementType);
397      return new FluentListAssertion<>(this, cast(List.class), returns());
398   }
399
400   /**
401    * Converts this object assertion into a map assertion.
402    *
403    * @return A new assertion.
404    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a map.
405    */
406   public FluentMapAssertion<String,Object,R> asMap() {
407      return asMap(String.class,Object.class);
408   }
409
410   /**
411    * Converts this object assertion into a map assertion with the specified key and value types.
412    *
413    * @param <K> The key type.
414    * @param <V> The value type.
415    * @param keyType The key type.
416    * @param valueType The value type.
417    * @return A new assertion.
418    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a map.
419    */
420   public <K,V> FluentMapAssertion<K,V,R> asMap(Class<K> keyType, Class<V> valueType) {
421      Utils.assertArgNotNull("keyType", keyType);
422      Utils.assertArgNotNull("valueType", valueType);
423      return new FluentMapAssertion<>(this, cast(Map.class), returns());
424   }
425
426   /**
427    * Converts this object assertion into a bean assertion.
428    *
429    * @param <T2> The bean type.
430    * @param beanType The bean type.
431    * @return A new assertion.
432    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a bean.
433    */
434   public <T2> FluentBeanAssertion<T2,R> asBean(Class<T2> beanType) {
435      Utils.assertArgNotNull("beanType", beanType);
436      return new FluentBeanAssertion<>(this, cast(beanType), returns());
437   }
438
439   /**
440    * Converts this object assertion into a bean assertion.
441    *
442    * @return A new assertion.
443    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a bean.
444    */
445   public FluentBeanAssertion<T,R> asBean() {
446      return new FluentBeanAssertion<>(this, orElse(null), returns());
447   }
448
449   /**
450    * Converts this object assertion into a list-of-beans assertion.
451    *
452    * @param <T2> The bean type.
453    * @param beanType The bean type.
454    * @return A new assertion.
455    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a bean.
456    */
457   public <T2> FluentBeanListAssertion<T2,R> asBeanList(Class<T2> beanType) {
458      Utils.assertArgNotNull("beanType", beanType);
459      return new FluentBeanListAssertion<>(this, cast(List.class), returns());
460   }
461
462   /**
463    * Converts this object assertion into a zoned-datetime assertion.
464    *
465    * @return A new assertion.
466    * @throws AssertionError If object is not a zoned-datetime.
467    */
468   public FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<R> asZonedDateTime() {
469      return new FluentZonedDateTimeAssertion<>(this, cast(ZonedDateTime.class), returns());
470   }
471
472   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
473   // Fluent setters
474   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
475
476   // <FluentSetters>
477
478   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
479   public FluentAnyAssertion<T,R> setMsg(String msg, Object...args) {
480      super.setMsg(msg, args);
481      return this;
482   }
483
484   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
485   public FluentAnyAssertion<T,R> setOut(PrintStream value) {
486      super.setOut(value);
487      return this;
488   }
489
490   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
491   public FluentAnyAssertion<T,R> setSilent() {
492      super.setSilent();
493      return this;
494   }
495
496   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
497   public FluentAnyAssertion<T,R> setStdOut() {
498      super.setStdOut();
499      return this;
500   }
501
502   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
503   public FluentAnyAssertion<T,R> setThrowable(Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> value) {
504      super.setThrowable(value);
505      return this;
506   }
507
508   // </FluentSetters>
509
510   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
511   // Utility methods
512   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
513
514   private <T2> T2 cast(Class<T2> c) throws AssertionError {
515      Object o = orElse(null);
516      if (o == null || c.isInstance(o))
517         return c.cast(o);
518      throw new BasicAssertionError(MSG_objectWasNotType, ClassInfo.of(c).getFullName(), o.getClass());
519   }
520}
